azurerm_log_analytics_workspace.description: Manages a Log Analytics (formally Operational Insights) Workspace.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Log Analytics Workspace. Workspace name should include 4-63 letters, digits or '-'. The '-' shouldn't be the first or the last symbol. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the Log Analytics workspace is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

sku.description: Specifies the Sku of the Log Analytics Workspace. Possible values are `Free`, `PerNode`, `Premium`, `Standard`, `Standalone`, `Unlimited`, and `PerGB2018` (new Sku as of `2018-04-03`).

retention_in_days.description: The workspace data retention in days. Possible values range between 30 and 730.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

primary_shared_key.description: The Primary shared key for the Log Analytics Workspace.

secondary_shared_key.description: The Secondary shared key for the Log Analytics Workspace.

workspace_id.description: The Workspace (or Customer) ID for the Log Analytics Workspace.

portal_url.description: The Portal URL for the Log Analytics Workspace.

create.description: Used when creating the Log Analytics Workspace.

update.description: Used when updating the Log Analytics Workspace.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Log Analytics Workspace.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Log Analytics Workspace.
